text: 'Your overconfidence is your weakness.'       'Your faith in Wild Arms' soundtracks is yours.'
author: Guyal Sfere

text: Ah this game. Probably my favourite part about the overworld was horseback riding and fighting on horseback. And summons. I gave Virgillia the phoenix and never got tired of using it.
author: yoshimario40

text:
Overall, I must say that she is the best video game composer... I love Uematsu, Mitsuda, Shimomura... but there is something really special about the Wild Arms OST.
Thank You SD! 

Must be the whistling of the West.

text: AHH I DID IT! I just caught up to the final playlist lol! Good stuff SupraDarky, there's a ton of great music on here both some I've heard and new ones to discover! Keep it up and consider yourself subbed!

text: One of the best RPG's ever to grace this world.
author: bloodyangel1

text: Ah, the days of scanning every last patch of land.
author: Sephiko

text: The longer time passes, the more I miss this series and its western setting. It's good to know Media Vision are still alive and well though, and I'm certainly looking forward to the next Valkyria game (including Mitsuda's music). Still, I'm sad that Naruke's great musical talent isn't being used more since the Wild Arms series took a halt.
author: SupraDarky

text: SupraDarky eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!!!!! I love this series and out of it, this game the most. It's because I remember finding it at Blockbuster with my sister and renting it on a whim. We returned it, but I remembered the cover and when I found it again in a store, I bought it.
author: terracannon876
